page.shortlink: api client api a5 ink lines graph settings object
page.description: Definition of the ink page graph lines.

property.name: style
property.description: The style to render the lines in. The default value of "normal" will always render graph lines. A value of "editing" will only render graph lines when editing the ink.

property.name: width
property.description: The "ink units" width of the lines.

property.name: color
property.description: CSS color to use for the graph lines.

property.name: size
property.description: The "ink units" size for graph cell.

property.name: minor
property.description: The number of minor lines to draw in each graph cell. The default of "0" will not draw any minor lines.

property.name: margin
property.description: The margins for the graph lines.

property.name: top
property.description: The "ink units" top margin of the lines.

property.name: left
property.description: The "ink units" left margin of the lines.

property.name: right
property.description: The "ink units" right margin of the lines.

property.name: bottom
property.description: The "ink units" bottom margin of the lines.

property.name: adjust
property.description: Whether or not to dynamically increase the margins so there will not be partial graph cells.
